```{r load_packages, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("circle", fill = "#e4e4e4", height = "15px"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-circle", fill = "#428bca", height = "15px"))


wk_post <- tibble(
  
"eCampus" = c(unchecked, 
              unchecked, 
              unchecked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked),

"Slack" = c(unchecked,
            checked,
            checked,
            checked,
            checked),

Description = c("Take the Considering Program Evaluation survey",
                "Read two articles and create postings",
                "Respond to the `#pictures-of-evaluation` post",
                "Describe a definition of evaluation you identify with",
                "Assess logistics when considering possible teammates"),

Location = c("[Link](/assignment/02-assignment/#evaluation-teams)^[Unique link sent to your WVU Mix e-mail account.]",
             "[Link](/readings/02-readings/#read-some-papers)",
             "[Link](/lesson/02-lesson/#responses)",
             "[Link](/lesson/02-lesson/#evaluation-definitions)",
             "[Link](/assignment/02-assignment/#evaluation-teams)")

)
```
